text: The 2016 Women's U22 South American Volleyball Championship will be the second edition of the tournament, organised by South America's governing volleyball body, the Confederación Sudamericana de Voleibol (CSV). ==Preliminary round== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the Semifinals |- |width=10px bgcolor=#dfefff| ||Qualified for the 5th place match |} ===Pool A=== |} |} ===Pool B=== |} |} ==Final round== ===5th–6th place=== |} ===Final four=== ====Semifinals==== |} ====3rd place match==== |} ====Final==== |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team |- align=center bgcolor=ccffcc | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center | |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |4 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |5 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |6 |style="text-align:left;"| |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2017 Women's U23 World Championship |} {| style="text-align: center; margin- top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |14–woman Roster |- | Drussyla Costa (c), Lyara Medeiros, Maira Claro, Karoline Tórmena, Lays Freitas, Natalia Silva, Fernanda Batista Lorenne Teixeta, Lais Vasques, Amabilie Koester, Lana Conceicao, Bruna Costa, Mayany de Souza, Vitoria Lage, |- |Head Coach |- | |} ==All-Star Team== *Most Valuable Player ** *Best Setter ** *Best Opposite ** *Best Outside Hitters ** ** *Best Middle Blockers ** ** *Best Libero ** ==See also== *2016 Men's U23 South American Volleyball Championship ==External links== *CSV official website Category:Women's South American Volleyball Championships S
title: 2016 Women's U22 South American Volleyball Championship
